attributes.action: A vote of no confidence in the Prime Minister
attributes.additional_details:
Failing to consult.
Acting in haste.
Failing to plan.
Proceeding with knee jerk policies.

These are not the haul marks of ability for the position of Prime Minster.

But for 13 votes on August 29th 2013, the UK may have carried out an Act of War without a UN mandate or any evidence of a direct threat to our country.

Politcal and personal posturing is not acceptable and he must go.

Please support this petition before our Prime Minster suceeds in a future disaster. Thank you. P Baker

rejection.details: Votes of no confidence are a matter for Parliament not the Government.
